title: A Pet Banana
description: Children can learn basic colors with this fun story/rhyme!A few years ago my mom had open heart surgery; during this procedure she had a major stroke. My mother had a huge struggle ahead of her and with stroke damage believed so severe that we could only hope for minimum recovery.Against all odds my mom proved everyone wrong! She made huge gains in every area through extraordinary courage and perseverance.A Pet Banana is a rhyme/story that I came up with one night to help my mom with speech therapy. We needed to do speaking exercises in between visits and A Pet Banana and other stories we created together was a fun way to do this! We hope you and your children enjoy this audiobook, it will make a great companion for the paperback edition.
author: Othen Donald Dale Cummings
